original_title: PUCSL Seeks Public Input on Electricity Cost Adjustments
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Public Utilities Commission (PUCSL) announced hat the public will have the opportunity to provide verbal feedback on the proposed electricity tariff revisions from February 15th onwards.
This comes in addition to the ongoing written submission period, which ends on February 12th.
The proposed electricity tariff revision proposal was submitted to the PUCSL by the Ceylon Electricity Board (CEB) in recent weeks.
